A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seeing Luke brought so low was very\, very difficult.  But the high of actually SEEING Luke\, helped (somewhat)\, to balance that out.  That said\, he's the only one I want to see.  Everything else Rian (who spells Ryan this way?  A TWAT) wrote was absolute garbage.  It is clear that Rian's alter-ego is a purple-haired\, vegan feminist-- she took over during the entire re-writing of the Star Wars Universe.  Star Wars is a trilogy.  There are exactly three films.  Episodes IV\, V\, and VI.  Enjoy those :)  from the 70s and 80s.  Star Wars in 2017 is a political piece of propaganda and dead.
